    • Method Detail

      • createBuiltInNavigationItems

        @Transactional(propagation=REQUIRED)
public boolean createBuiltInNavigationItems(Long userId)
                                                                          throws AuthorizationException
        Create the built-in immutable navigation items for the current user if they do not yet exist.
        Specified by:
        createBuiltInNavigationItems in interface NavigationItemManagement
        Parameters:
        userId - The ID of the user to update
        Returns:
        true if the items where created, false if they already existed
        Throws:
        AuthorizationException - If the current user is not the provided user or the internal system user

      • delete

        @Transactional(propagation=REQUIRED)
public boolean delete(Long navigationItemId)
                                                    throws AuthorizationException
        Delete a given item.
        Specified by:
        delete in interface NavigationItemManagement
        Parameters:
        navigationItemId - ID of the item to delete.
        Returns:
        whether the item existed
        Throws:
        AuthorizationException - in case the current user is not the owner of the item

      • find

        @Transactional(readOnly=true)
public <DATA_TYPE extends NavigationItemDataTO> List<NavigationItemTO<DATA_TYPE>> find(Class<DATA_TYPE> type,
                                                                                                                     Long... navigationItemIds)
                                                                                                              throws NavigationItemDataSerializationException
        Method to find all items for the current user.
        Specified by:
        find in interface NavigationItemManagement
        Type Parameters:
        DATA_TYPE - the type of the data of the item
        Parameters:
        type - the type of the data of the item
        navigationItemIds - Id's of items to load or null, if all.
        Returns:
        List of loaded navigation items.
        Throws:
        NavigationItemDataSerializationException - Thrown, when the given data can't be converted into the given type.

      • get

        @Transactional(readOnly=true)
public <T> Collection<T> get(CollectionConverter<NavigationItem,T> converter,
                                                           Long... ids)
        Method to find all navigation items for the current user.
        Specified by:
        get in interface NavigationItemManagement
        Type Parameters:
        T - Type of the result.
        Parameters:
        converter - The converter to use for result converting.
        ids - Ids of items to get or null to get all items.
        Returns:
        List of results. This never returns null.

      • get

        @Transactional(readOnly=true)
public <DATA_TYPE extends NavigationItemDataTO> NavigationItemTO<DATA_TYPE> get(Long notificationItemId,
                                                                                                              Class<DATA_TYPE> type)
                                                                                                       throws NavigationItemDataSerializationException
        Method to get an item for the given user.
        Specified by:
        get in interface NavigationItemManagement
        Type Parameters:
        DATA_TYPE - the type of the data of the item
        Parameters:
        notificationItemId - Id of the item to get.
        type - Type of the data, if null, the data won't be deserialized.
        Returns:
        Null, if the item doesn't exists for the given user (this exits quietly).
        Throws:
        NavigationItemDataSerializationException - Thrown, when the given data can't be converted into the given type.

      • store

        @Transactional(propagation=REQUIRED)
public <T extends NavigationItemDataTO> Long store(NavigationItemTO<T> navigationItem)
                                                                                 throws AuthorizationException,
                                                                                        NavigationItemDataSerializationException
        Updates the given item or creates a new one.
        Specified by:
        store in interface NavigationItemManagement
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the data of the item
        Parameters:
        navigationItem - Item to update.
        Returns:
        Id of the created or updated item.
        Throws:
        AuthorizationException - in case the item to update exists but the current user is not the owner of it
        NavigationItemDataSerializationException - Thrown, when the given data can't be converted into JSON
